directions: Blend together butter or margarine, eggs, cocoa, sugar, milk, and vanilla with a hand mixer until smooth.  Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 45 minutes, or until set.  Let cool before slicing.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Chocolate Chess Pie I
